ratings.comment: Chris is honestly THE WORST professor I have ever had. He will not learn your name and refer to you as it, in a class of 9 students. He has no respect for his dancers and no respect for his students. He gives no clear instructions, no clear grading policy, and violates dance department policy for his absence requirements. THE ABSOLUTE WORST.

This guy and his class is just straight up evil, like dude, we have a life and other courses as well, you know. He just throws you like 3 hours of videos and 15 pages of reading EVERY WEEK (not months, WEEKS). I don't even care if I like the contents or not, but being shoved in the face like this is not okay. HIGHLY NOT RECOMMENDED.

Professor Walker was readily accessible outside of class and provided clear feedback on assignments. Although this asynchronous, online class was organized poorly, I thought Prof. Walker and the content itself was interesting and engaging!

To say this class was my least favorite class of all time is an understatement. I dreaded every time I had to open it on canvas. It is an online course and there is no lecture. There are damn near 15 assignments a week + 50-100 pages of reading each week. Hard grader & u must use quotes in your work. DONT TAKE unless you love afro dance culture.

Guy definitely cares about his material but just THROWS material after material at you. Under the ruse of an "online class" he makes you do FAR more work than in any other ENGINEERING class i've taken to date. BUT there are easy hacks like quoting the first few sentences of his 3 HOUR WEEKLY READINGS and passing that off as the summary. AVOID.
